articles.author: MOHAMED JAHJOUH and JOSEF FEDERMAN
articles.description: KHAN YOUNIS, Gaza Strip (AP) — Israel said it targeted Hamas’ shadowy military commander in a massive strike Saturday in the crowded southern Gaza Strip that killed at least 71 people, according to local health officials.
articles.title: An Israeli attack targeting the Hamas military commander kills at least 71 in southern Gaza

articles.author: SEUNG MIN KIM
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Joe Biden is on a public and private blitz to shake off concerns about his cognitive capacities.But with public doubts about his fitness to serve unabating, Biden’s every move is now under a withering microscope as any potential stumble risks becoming magnified and delivering another blow to his candidacy.
articles.title: Biden's supporters want to 'let Joe be Joe' — but his stumbles are now under a bigger spotlight

articles.author: JILL COLVIN
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Donald Trump will have one last chance Saturday to unveil his vice presidential pick on a rally stage before the Republican National Convention kicks off in Milwaukee next week.
articles.title: Trump heads to Pennsylvania for pre-convention rally as VP announcement looms

articles.author: SCOTT BAUER
articles.description: MILWAUKEE (AP) — Milwaukee loves its Miller Beer, Brewers baseball and “ Bronze Fonz ” statue.
articles.title: Deeply Democratic Milwaukee wrestles with hosting Trump and the Republican National Convention

articles.author: ELLEN KNICKMEYER
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — European allies in NATO are stepping up their military spending, just as Donald Trump wanted. They're pointing to common interests, such as concerns over China.
articles.title: With words, deeds and arms deals, allies make the case for NATO in terms that would appeal to Trump

articles.author: MARK KENNEDY
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Dr. Ruth Westheimer, the diminutive sex therapist who became a pop icon, media star and best-selling author through her frank talk about once-taboo bedroom topics, has died. She was 96.
articles.title: Dr. Ruth Westheimer, America’s diminutive and pioneering sex therapist, dies at 96

articles.author: HUIZHONG WU and DEEPA BHARATH
articles.description: HUALIEN, Taiwan (AP) — When a 7.4-magnitude earthquake ripped through Taiwan in April, it took about 30 minutes for the region’s most ubiquitous charity to set up an emergency response center.
articles.title: A Taiwan-based Buddhist charity attempts to take the founding nun's message of compassion global

articles.author: SAMYA KULLAB and ELISE MORTON
articles.description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Russian shelling of Ukraine killed four people on Saturday, officials said, as the two countries exchanged drone attacks, one of which set ablaze a Russian oil depot. Two people died in Ukraine’s partly occupied Kherson region and two were wounded in the attack close to the regional capital, said Gov.
articles.title: Shelling kills 4 in Ukraine as a drone attack sparks fire at an oil depot in Russia

articles.author: MORGAN LEE
articles.description: SANTA FE, N.M. (AP) — A nearly three-year legal saga for Alec Baldwin in the fatal shooting of a cinematographer ended Friday without a verdict but with tears of relief for the actor and a small coterie of family who had settled into a somber daily routine on wooden benches inside a windowless New Mexico courtroom at trial.
articles.title: Inside the courtroom as case dismissed against Alec Baldwin in fatal shooting of cinematographer

articles.author: JAMES POLLARD
articles.description: HOUSTON (AP) — The deafening hum of a generator was a welcome noise Thursday evening at a Houston independent living center where several dozen seniors had lost power in the wake of Hurricane Beryl.
articles.title: Houston community groups strain to keep feeding and cooling a city battered by repeat storms
